resources.string:
Click on the mic image and say whatever you want to buy from the next kinds of product: essential products, random things, furniture, parapharmacy or tools. 

If you have the mute persons' option activated, write the kind of product you want to buy.

This is a nonprofit app. 

The purpose of this app is to help those who are not acquainted with technology, so they can buy all the things they need through the Internet without any problems. 

Click on the image to continue.

In Lidl's Spanish website, there is no English translation. In Lidl's website you can buy as a guest without any account but it is recommended to have one. 

First, you click on Identifícate, if you already have an account, identify yourself, if not, click on Regístrate and create a Lidl account. After that, search what you want to buy and click on Añadir a la Cesta. 

Do the same with all the products you want, when you finish, click on Cesta and later, click on Compra Ya. Introduce your personal data, your payment method and click on Pagar.

In Amazon's Spanish website, there is no English translation, the US website was chosen instead. 

First, you click on the person symbol button on the upper right side of the screen. Later, if you already have an account, select Sign-In, if not, click on Create account to create one. After that, search what you want to buy and, if the product can be delivered, click on Add to Cart. 

Do the same with all the products you want, when you finish, click on the Cart and later, click on Proceed to checkout. Introduce your personal data, your direction, your payment method and the delivery option that you want from those available and click on Place your order in EUR.

In Ikea's website you can buy without any account but it is recommended to have one. 

First, you click on Hej! Log in or sign up. Later, if you already have an account click, on Log in and identify yourself, if not, click on Join IKEA Family and create an Ikea account. After that, search what you want to buy and click on Add to Cart. 

Do the same with all the products you want, when you finish, click on the Cart and later, click on Continue to checkout. Choose whether you want to pick them up at a pick-up point or for them to be delivered to your home. Introduce your personal data, your payment method and click on Pay.

In DrFarma\'s website you can buy as a guest without any account but it is recommended to have one. First, you click on Sign in. If you already have an account, identify yourself, if not, click on No account? to create a DrFarma account. After that, search what you want to buy and click on Add to Cart. Do the same with all the products you want, when you finish, click on Shopping Cart and later, click on Proceed to checkout. Introduce your personal data, your shipping method, your payment method and click on Order with an obligation to pay.\n\n

In Leroy Merlin's Spanish website, there is no English translation. In Lidl's website you can buy without any account but it is recommended to have one. 

First, you click on the person symbol button on the upper right side of the screen. Later, if you already have an account, identify yourself, if not, click on Registrarme and create a Leroy Merlin account. After that, search what you want to buy and click on Add to Cart. 

Do the same with all the products you want, when you finish, click on the Cart and later, click on Tramitar pedido. Introduce your personal data and click on Guardar Cambios, choose the shipping method you like for each product and click on Ir a resumen. Click on Ir a pago, choose your payment method and click on Pagar.
"Your device does not support voice recognition."
Enable Written Mode for Mute Persons
Write whatever you want to buy here.
In the case of finding any problem with the app, you can search for help through the contact info next:
